name: aseg2feat
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Resamples the FreeSurfer automatic subcortical segmentation (aseg) to the FEAT functional space.

inputs.description: FEAT output directory. Multiple --feat arguments can be supplied.
inputs.name: FEAT directory

inputs.description: File with a list of FEAT directories. Can be used in conjunction with --feat.
inputs.name: FEAT directory file

inputs.description: Change segmentation volume, default is aseg.
inputs.name: Segmentation volume

inputs.description: Save result in featdir/stats instead of featdir/reg/freesurfer
inputs.name: Save stats flag

inputs.description: Map results to standard space instead of native functional space. Implies --svstats.
inputs.name: Standard space flag

output-files.description: Result segmentation in FEAT functional space.
output-files.name: Segmentation output

output-files.description: Directory where results are saved when using --svstats.
output-files.name: Stats output directory
